author: llunerti
body:
I'm adding new pdl files with Bs modified lifetime needed by B->MuMu analysis group for the central production of Bs->MuMu samples. I'm attaching below the diff with evt_2014.pdl for each new pdl file. Local tests have already been performed by analyzers in order to check that everything works fine.

[diff_output.txt](https://github.com/cms-data/GeneratorInterface-EvtGenInterface/files/6385721/diff_output.txt)
title: Adding new pdl files for Bs->MuMu decay with modified Bs lifetime
